paper.title: Fast Detection of Polyhedral Intersections
paper.venue: International Colloquium on Automata, Languages and Programming
paper.abstract: Methods are given for unifying and extending previous work on detecting polyhedral intersections. The technique of dynamic (vs. static) description is introduced and used to extend previous results. New upper bounds of O(log n) and O(log2n) are given on plane-polyhedron and polyhedron-polyhedron intersection problems.
